input.sentences: the team strategized about how they would play against each other .
the gamers were very intense into their matches .
afterwards they discussed the results of the game .
output.sentences: It started here with one idea: coding the perfect game.
Every developer met to create their strategy and pick their test gamers.
A nervous lead developer, Tim, still doubts Mark and Sue when they prove their game is test-ready.
As producers and investors nervously watch the test gamers battle each other, developers make mental note of bugs to fix in the final phase.
When the testers were done and gave their approval, all designers celebrated and strategized their final phase.
